summary: Weather app starter built on Internet Computer with Motoko backend and React/Vite/Tailwind + shadcn/ui frontend, Internet Identity auth, location search, current weather display, and weather-based advice/warnings UI; project branding updated to W Tracking / Weather Gizmos.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko with generated Candid bindings and project wiring for local/deploy builds.

existing_features.title: React + Vite + Tailwind frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend application with Vite build, Tailwind styling, and core app layout wiring.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library integrated
existing_features.description: Large set of shadcn/ui components added and configured for the frontend.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks and ESLint safeguards for Internet Identity provider usage; actor wiring for authenticated calls.

existing_features.title: Location search (geocoding) integration
existing_features.description: Location search component and hook using a geocoding service to resolve places for weather lookup.

existing_features.title: Current weather fetching and display
existing_features.description: Weather API service, typed models, hooks for fetching current weather, and UI panel to render results.

existing_features.title: Weather advice banner
existing_features.description: Derives and displays weather-based advice content in the UI.

existing_features.title: Client-side storage utility
existing_features.description: Utility for storing/retrieving small app state on the client (e.g., selections/preferences).

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template and scripts
existing_features.description: Dockerfile, ICP config, workspace/package setup, and image tooling scripts (resize/prune) for builds and deployment.

existing_features.title: Add the existing app logo image to the landing/empty-state screen (the screen shown before a user starts searching for a location), using the existing generated asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/weather-logo.dim_512x512.png`.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a logo to the app (logo shown on the landing/splash screen page)

architectural_notes: Architecture includes an ICP Motoko backend canister with generated Candid bindings consumed by a React/Vite frontend.
Frontend uses Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui component set; custom ESLint rules enforce Internet Identity provider usage and prevent problematic BigInt usage in query keys.
Frontend integrates external geocoding and weather APIs via service modules and React hooks.
Build template includes scripts to resize/prune generated images and a deploy script/config for ICP.

generatedImages.description: Generated hero image asset for the weather app.
Generated logo image asset for the weather app.
